text: some people are driven by the end goal
the outcome that's not me i get excited
about what i'm doing every day and if
i'm not excited about what i'm doing
every day then i don't function the
inspiration for love pop came out of we
were in ho chi minh city in vietnam and
happened to run into these incredible
artistic pop-up cards
we just saw this
whole set of possibilities we could
engineer anything into a pop-up card and
so it just one thing led to another and
all of a sudden we started a greeting
card company
i think the hardest thing for us as an
early stage company is to focus there's
this world of possibilities of different
markets different products different
business models but the only way that
you actually move forward and get things
done is if you have a crystal clear and
laser-focused vision
why does love pop exist it exists
because human relationships are special
and they need to be cultivated and
maintain it we all need to do better at
doing things for the special people in
our lives
working on love pop it is all about
people you know when you have a good day
or a bad day that's because of how
things went with the people around you
and so
that is the core of what i'm interested
in
